title: Polki Emerald Drop Jhumka - Kundan Vaibhava
materials: Pear-shaped Emerald center stone. Setting is meticulously handcrafted Kundan.
features: These stunning Jhumkas feature a classic teardrop (arugu poola) design, incorporating traditional Kundan craftsmanship with a modern aesthetic. The center piece features a lush pear-shaped emerald set in a framework of meticulously arranged rose-cut Polki diamonds. The Polki stones are set in the traditional Kundan style, creating a rich, textured finish. The earrings showcase a delicate diamond fringe surrounding the central emerald. The top is the same design as the bottom but smaller and without the emerald. Handcrafted by artisans in Hyderabad, using age-old techniques.
colors: and shimmering White from the Polki Diamonds. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's warmth
beautifully contrasting with the emerald's vibrancy and the Polki's subtle sparkle.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Equally stunning for a modern evening soiree where you wish to make a statement.
description: These Polki Emerald Jhumkas represent a perfect blend of tradition and contemporary style. The use of uncut Polki diamonds offers a unique, vintage appeal, while the vibrant emerald adds a touch of modern luxury.
